span.span: Please refer to this page for information from the school district. It will be regularly updated when information is received with the newest at the top.
Parents - Please take a few minutes to complete a survey giving the district feedback on Distance Learning.

span.strong: Pipestone Area Schools Food Service Request

span.span: The COVID-19 School Closure has left families concerned about providing a variety of resources. Pipestone Area Schools will be offering meals free of charge to all children 18 and under, per State allowance during this State of Emergency. Delivery and pick up options will be determined based on participation and location of food services requests. If you would like to participate in this service, click on the link to complete the survey.
Twice a Week Meal Delivery to Start Friday, April 17

span.span: Honeywell Message from Superintendent Enerson, March 25

span.a: Talking with children about COVID-19, March 16, 2020

span.style: font-family: Tahoma, arial, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

br.span: El cierre de la escuela COVID-19 ha dejado a las familias preocupadas sobre proporcionar una variedad de recursos. Las escuelas del área de Pipestone ofrecerán comidas gratuitas a todos los niños menores de 18 años, según la asignación estatal durante este estado de emergencia. Las opciones de recoger la comida o que sea entregada se determinara basado en la participacion y ubicacion de las solicitudes del servicio de alimentos. Si a usted le gustaria participar en este servicio, por favor complete al

span.style: font-family: Tahoma, arial, Geneva, sans-serif; font-size: 14px;

Distribución de comida cambiará a dos veces por semana de entrega
